parameters.name: ColumnName
parameters.description:
The name of the sensitive field. You can call the [ListSensitiveColumns](~~188103~~) operation to query the name of the sensitive field.

> You can also call the [ListColumns](~~141870~~) operation to query the name of the sensitive field.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [ListInstances](~~141936~~) or [GetInstance](~~141567~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SchemaName
parameters.description:
The database name. You can also call the [SearchDatabase](~~141876~~) operation to query the name of the database.

> You can also call the [ListDatabases](~~141873~~) operation to query the value of the SchemaName parameter of a physical database, or the [ListLogicDatabases](~~141874~~) operation to query the value of the SchemaName parameter of a logical database.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description:
The name of the table. You can call the [ListSensitiveColumns](~~188103~~) operation to query the table name.

> You can also call the [ListTables](~~141878~~) operation to query the table name.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the ID of the tenant, go to the DMS console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
